1.title: The Red Hood

episode of.title: Red Hood: The Fan Series (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

1.plot: With the mysterious disappearance of The Batman, Gotham has fallen into a state of chaos. Out of the ashes, a new hero will rise (if he feels like it...) The Red Hood.

2.title: Damian Wayne - Son of the Batman

episode of.title: Red Hood: The Fan Series (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

2.plot: After the disappearance of Batman, the streets of Gotham are running red with the blood of the innocent, but not if Damian Wayne has anything to say about it.

3.title: Tim Drake, the Red Robin

episode of.title: Red Hood: The Fan Series (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

3.plot: As Jason (Red Hood) and Damian (Robin) interrogate a young thug, they find that Black Mask's plan may not be all that it appears. With Tim Drake (Red Robin) now missing, the choice is clear. Before the final showdown, they must save Tim.

4.title: The Beginning of the End

episode of.title: Red Hood: The Fan Series (TV Mini-Series 2018– )

4.plot: When the nefarious Black Mask has Tim Drake in his grasp, only Jason and Damian can save him. but little do they know, there is a far worse plot that is about to unfold.

imdb.plot outline: Batman has disappeared leaving Gotham City to fall into chaos. As the remaining heroes of Gotham attempt to keep the city under control, Black Mask begins to once again command the criminal underworld, this time by resurrecting the long forgotten Red Hood Gang. Too much for one hero alone, the Robins Dick Grayson (Nightwing), Jason Todd (The Red Hood), Tim Drake (Red Robin), and Damian Wayne (current Robin) are forced to join together under the direction of The Red Hood and take down Black Mask's nefarious plot.
imdb.title: Red Hood: The Fan Series
akas: Red Hood: The Fan Series (United States)
plot: Batman has disappeared leaving Gotham City to fall into chaos. As the remaining heroes of Gotham attempt to keep the city under control, Black Mask begins to once again command the criminal underworld, this time by resurrecting the long forgotten Red Hood Gang. Too much for one hero alone, the Robins Dick Grayson (Nightwing), Jason Todd (The Red Hood), Tim Drake (Red Robin), and Damian Wayne (current Robin) are forced to join together under the direction of The Red Hood and take down Black Mask's nefarious plot.::Ian Lang
